From: Sheryl Lyn Balles Bernardo <SBalles@emaar.ae> 
Sent: Tuesday, November 5, 2024 1:53 PM
Cc: Ausyvieree Macanlalay Benito <ABenito@emaar.ae>
Subject: FW: DMM & MR - Trade License & Insurance Documents Update
Importance: High

 

CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe. 
تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن

Dear Valued Tenants,

Further to the attached Memo 1729 which was previously issued, please be reminded to upload the valid copies of the following documents to the TENANT PORTAL by Friday, 8th November 2024 to ensure that our records are up-to-date:

1.	Trade License
2.	Business Interruption Insurance
3.	Public Liability Insurance
4.	Plate Glass
5.	Property All Risk Insurance
6.	Workmen’s Compensation & Employers Liability Insurance



Please confirm via email once the above documents have been uploaded for review. 

We appreciate your prompt response and compliance with this requirement.

 

 

Best regards,

 

Sheryl Balles-Bernardo

 



  

Dubai Marina Mall & Marina Retail

Emaar Malls Management LLC 

 

T +97144361059

From: Sheryl Lyn Balles Bernardo 
Sent: Friday, October 11, 2024 9:46 AM
Cc: Ausyvieree Macanlalay Benito <ABenito@emaar.ae <mailto:ABenito@emaar.ae> >
Subject: FW: DMM & MR - Trade License, AMC & Insurance Documents Update

 

Dear Valued Retailers,

 

Please be reminded to submit the following required compliance documents. If you have already submitted these documents, please disregard this email.

1.	Trade License
2.	Business Interruption Insurance
3.	Public Liability Insurance
4.	Plate Glass
5.	Property All Risk Insurance
6.	Workmen’s Compensation & Employers Liability Insurance
7.	Fire Alarm AMC
8.	Fire Fighting AMC
9.	Pest Control AMC (as per Emaar approved list of service providers – Memo 1714)
10.	Kitchen Exhaust Cleaning AMC (only applicable to F&B unit)

Further to Memo 1729 issued previously, kindly ensure the Trade License and Insurance copies are also uploaded into the Tenant Portal. 

     

We appreciate your prompt response and compliance.

 

 

Best regards,

 

Sheryl Balles-Bernardo

 



  

Dubai Marina Mall & Marina Retail

Emaar Malls Management LLC 

 

T +97144361059

chunks.text:
7C0%7C638664007450985408%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=mN68d42goJwktnpdrgqNhxDXcXt5A2i%2F%2F8AhRlVAhiM%3D&reserved=0> 

 

From: Sheryl Lyn Balles Bernardo 
Sent: Tuesday, July 23, 2024 4:46 PM
Cc: Janke Jordaan <J.Jordaan@emaar.ae <mailto:J.Jordaan@emaar.ae> >; Ausyvieree Macanlalay Benito <ABenito@emaar.ae <mailto:ABenito@emaar.ae> >
Subject: DMM & MR - Trade License, AMC & Insurance Documents Update

 

Dear Valued Retailers,

Hope this email finds you well.

In accordance with your Lease Agreement, please provide us with valid copies of the following documents:

1.	Trade License
2.	Business Interruption Insurance
3.	Public Liability Insurance
4.	Plate Glass
5.	Property All Risk Insurance
6.	Workmen’s Compensation & Employers Liability Insurance
7.	Fire Alarm AMC
8.	Fire Fighting AMC
9.	Pest Control AMC (as per Emaar approved list of service providers – Memo 1714)
10.	Kitchen Exhaust Cleaning AMC (only applicable to F&B unit)

Further to Memo 1729 issued previously, kindly ensure the Trade License and Insurance copies are also uploaded into the Tenant Portal. 

     

We appreciate your prompt response and compliance.

 

 

 

Best regards,

 

Sheryl Balles-Bernardo

 



  

Dubai Marina Mall & Marina Retail

Emaar Malls Management LLC 

 

T +97144361059
